channel.title: Please help... mac
channel.description:
How would i convert this code to run on a mac? A member of mine is having troubles opening it. [code]@echo off title The Quickening Wars "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
[/code]
Please help
thanks,
Warlord m4x.

item.title: Please help... mac
item.dc:creator: @m4x_pwng3 m4x pwng3
item.description:
@m4x_pwng3 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:393795”]Open Terminal
Type in

cd path/to/server/files
java path/to/main

If he doesn’t know how to do that, he should probably go back to windows.[/quote]

okay

Read full topic

item.title: Please help... mac
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Open Terminal
Type in

cd path/to/server/files java path/to/main

If he doesn’t know how to do that, he should probably go back to windows.

item.title: Please help... mac
item.dc:creator: @darken4400 darken4400
item.description:
@darken4400 wrote:

2 things

  1. tell him to locate his java folder and the place where java.exe is located from his java folder on the mac(also if hes your friend you should help him by coming over to his house :])

  2. use the search bar, it helps when in doubt

item.title: Please help... mac

item.description:
@m4x_pwng3 wrote:

How would i convert this code to run on a mac? A member of mine is having troubles opening it.

[code]@echo off
title The Quickening Wars
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

[/code]
